item.title: §Internet and Computer History
item.description: Dream Machine § “Behind every great revolution is a vision, and behind one of the greatest revolutions of our time—personal computing—is the vision of J.

item.title: §Tools for Thought
item.description: Welcome to a page on using technology to think and learn more effectively. Let’s start with the basics: What is a tool for thought?.

item.title: technology is an idea or object that makes something easier
item.description: An average implicit definition of technology is something that involves electronics. And while that’s one manifestation, it’s far from the word’s main meaning.

item.title: technology is not just software
item.description: To define “technology” as information software is a disservice. See technology is an idea or object that makes something easier. Not only is it definitionally incorrect but it’s conceptually misleading.

item.title: tools for thought enable and unlock human comprehension and creativity
item.description: Tools for thought basically means what it says. It’s a technology that expands and improves our ability to work with and create ideas. To me, this raises the question of what the difference is between this and technology? See technology is an idea or object that makes something easier.

item.title: About
item.description: Thesis § We believe that the chronological blog is an artifact of the past. Instead we believe in work in progress and keeping the garage door open. We don’t wait until an answer is fully grown.
